column1: Smoque BBQ////On the way back from spending the morning at the Shedd Aquarium
column2: my husband had suggested we stop here for lunch. I had just bookmarked this place on Yelp after seeing them featured on Diners
column5: so I was excited to try the food. It did not disappoint. And keep in mind
column6: this review is coming from someone who normally avoids BBQ since I'm not the biggest fan of it.
